metadata.rationale: Extracted from canonical script and scene co-occurrence data.

data.description: MMMMMM is not a true character but rather a vocalized sound or exclamation uttered by Abe while fondling a price tag left on Dante's suit jacket. It represents Abe's theatrical, drawn-out moment of deduction as he pieces together that Cassandra took Dante shopping at Saks Fifth Avenue. It functions as a dramatic beat in Abe's performance rather than as a speaking character.
data.dialogue_summary: MMMMMM is a single vocalized exclamation attributed to Abe as he fondles a price tag on Dante's suit jacket, serving as a dramatic pause before he reveals his deduction that Cassandra took her shopping at Saks Fifth Avenue. It is not dialogue from an independent character.

inferred_traits.rationale: The capitalized 'MMMMMM' appears mid-stage-direction as part of Abe's extended, vampirish deduction sequence, functioning as a sound rather than a character utterance.
inferred_traits.value: Used as a theatrical sound effect within Abe's dialogue to heighten suspense and showmanship

data.name: MMMMMM
